author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the olive oil in a saucepan, add the onion and spring onion and fry for 4-5 minutes, or until softened but not browned. Add the garlic and fry for a further minute. Add the chopped sweet potato, stock and soy sauce and simmer for 6-8 minutes, or until the sweet potato is tender. Stir in the olives and rocket and then pour into a bowl. Garnish with dill and serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, chopped,  1 spring onion, chopped,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  ½ sweet potato, chopped,  300ml/½ pint hot chicken or vegetable stock,  2 tsp soy sauce,  2 tbsp kalamata olives,  40g/1½oz rocket,  sprig fresh dill, to garnish
